snippet: Cristiano Ronaldo, Lionel Messi and Franck Ribéry are the finalists for the Ballon d’Or as the world’s top soccer player.
abstract: Cristiano Ronaldo, Lionel Messi and Franck Ribery are the finalists for the Ballon d’Or as the world’s top soccer player; Messi has won the last four player of the year awards; other soccer news noted.
lead_paragraph: Cristiano Ronaldo, Lionel Messi and Franck Ribéry are the finalists for the Ballon d’Or as the world’s top soccer player.

headline.main: Three to Vie for the Ballon d’Or
headline.print_headline: Three to Vie for Top Player
